Testing VPMAXSB instruction
==========================
Test 1: 128-bit basic functionality
Operand A: 127 -128 50 -100 0 75 -25 100 -50 25 -75 0 100 -100 127 -128 
Operand B: -128 127 -50 100 75 0 -100 25 100 -25 0 -75 -128 127 -100 100 
Result: 127 127 50 100 75 75 -25 100 100 25 0 0 100 127 127 100 
Expected: 127 127 50 100 75 75 -25 100 100 25 0 0 100 127 127 100 
[PASS]

Test 2: 128-bit memory operand
Operand A (register): 100 -110 120 -110 -110 120 120 -110 110 -120 -120 110 -110 120 120 -110 
Operand B (memory): 90 -120 100 -110 120 -110 -110 120 -120 110 -110 120 120 -110 -120 110 
Result: 100 -110 120 -110 120 120 120 120 110 110 -110 120 120 120 120 110 
Expected: 100 -110 120 -110 120 120 120 120 110 110 -110 120 120 120 120 110 
[PASS]

Test 3: 256-bit AVX operation
Operand A: -128 127 -128 127 -128 127 -128 127 -128 127 -128 127 -128 127 -128 127 -128 127 -128 127 -128 127 -128 127 -128 127 -128 127 -128 127 -128 127 
Operand B: 127 -128 -128 127 -128 -128 127 -128 -128 127 -128 -128 127 -128 -128 127 -128 -128 127 -128 -128 127 -128 -128 127 -128 -128 127 -128 -128 127 -128 
Result: 127 127 -128 127 -128 127 127 127 -128 127 -128 127 127 127 -128 127 -128 127 127 127 -128 127 -128 127 127 127 -128 127 -128 127 127 127 
Expected: 127 127 -128 127 -128 127 127 127 -128 127 -128 127 127 127 -128 127 -128 127 127 127 -128 127 -128 127 127 127 -128 127 -128 127 127 127 
[PASS]

VPMAXSB tests PASSED
